messages.subject: Tampa show
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - Just a short note before heading down the road to Tampa. Besides a few swords and fittings, I m bringing most of the books I bought several months
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

Just a short note before heading down the road to Tampa. Besides a few swords and fittings, I'm bringing most of the books I bought several months ago. I never did follow-up on peddling these via Ebay. If you're looking for any books, stop by and have a look. Books are HEAVY so this is a chance to save shipping/insurance plus...I sure don't look forward to lugging them back home again! Check out my table. I take (good) checks and of course, cash! Seriously, there are some good titles that I'll have there.

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Tampa show
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - Besides packing a nice selection of super swords for super prices for my table -- well, maybe I m overly optimistic a little -- I also lugged what
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

Besides packing a nice selection of super swords for super prices for my table -- well, maybe I'm overly optimistic a little -- I also lugged what seemed like a ton of books to the car that will be on my table. (Raising funds to pay off sword related debts.)

Will have my remaining copies of our 2007 KTK Tokyo exhibition catalogue for sale (nothing but compliments by those who have purchased this fine printing). Also have a copy of Nihonto Zuikan Koto-hen, a set of Shinshinto Taikan, Tsuba Taikan (reprint), Hakusui Inami's Nihonto; The Japanese Sword and a copy of Yumei Koto Taikan. Boy, these are heavy books! I don't know how the bookdealers can handle these critters show after show!

Hope to see you there, good Lord willing.

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
